item.description:
Hello Everybody,

Happy New Year!

We have a permanent home at BROOKLINE LIBRARY thanks to the efforts of Russell.

We are meeting at HUNNEMAN HALL. There is plenty of parking as well

We have 5 tables and 5 chairs per table and kitchen use as well.

The times also changed due to the hours of library. We will meet from 1:00 pm to 4:00 pm this Sunday

Please note there IS parking. PLEASE BE ON TIME.

Rules:

PLEASE SAY "YES" ONLY IF YOU ARE SURE
PLEASE ARRIVE 10 MINUTES EARLY. GAME STARTS ON TIME
WE PLAY WITH 2 TEAMS.
EACH TEAM IS ASSIGNED A COMMENTATOR.
GAME TIME IS 2 HOURS.
AT THE END OF EACH GAME, WE HOLD A COMMENTATOR SESSION FOR 15 MINUTES FOR EACH TEAM.
COMMENTATORS DISCUSS THE RISKS AND REWARDS TAKEN BY EACH TEAM MEMBER

WE DO HAVE A WAITING LIST. THE GAME WILL END AT 4 PM. GAME FEE IS $5 PER PLAYER. GAME FEE IS WAIVED FOR THOSE WHO BRING IN THEIR BOARDS

THANK YOU

EDAN BARSHAN
ORGANIZER
item.how_to_find_us: https://www.brooklinelibrary.com and click on MEETING ROOMS. We are meeting at HUNNEMAN HALL
item.name: The Metro Boston Cashflow January Meetup
